mapper.select: SELECT MLD.EXEC_TASK_ID AS UNLOADING_ID , MLD.ITEM_ID , MIN(MI.ITEM_NM) AS ITEM_NM , MIN(MI.ITEM_SPEC) AS ITEM_SPEC , MIN(MI.ITEM_TYPE) AS ITEM_TYPE , MIN((SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MLD.COMPANY_CD, MLD.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MI.ITEM_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL)) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , MLD.UNIT , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MLD.COMPANY_CD, MLD.DIVISION_CD, MLD.UNIT) FROM DUAL) AS UNIT_NM , SUM(MLD.QTY) AS UNLOADING_QTY , SUM(NVL(MLD.RESULT_QTY,0)) AS UNLOADING_RESULT_QTY , SUM(NVL(MLD.CLOSE_QTY,0)) , SUM(MLD.QTY - NVL(MLD.RESULT_QTY,0) - NVL(MLD.CLOSE_QTY,0)) AS REMAIN_QTY , MIN(MLM.LOCATION_CD) AS UNLOADING_LOCATION_CD , MIN(MLM.AREA_CD) AS TO_AREA_CD , MIN(MLM.LOGISTICS_UNIT_CD) AS TO_LOGISTICS_UNIT_CD , MLD.EXEC_TASK_ID||'-'|| MLD.ITEM_ID ||'-'|| MLD.UNIT AS KEY_ID , MLD.COMPANY_CD , MLD.DIVISION_CD FROM MOM_LOCATION_EXEC_TASK_MST MLM , MOM_LOCATION_EXEC_TASK_DTL MLD , MOM_ITEM MI WHERE MLM.COMPANY_CD = MLD.COMPANY_CD AND MLM.DIVISION_CD = MLD.DIVISION_CD AND MLM.EXEC_TASK_ID = MLD.EXEC_TASK_ID AND MLD.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MLD.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MLD.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MLD.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MLD.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MLD.EXEC_TASK_ID = #{unloadingId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MLD.STATE = 'LEF' GROUP BY MLD.COMPANY_CD , MLD.DIVISION_CD , MLD.EXEC_TASK_ID , MLD.ITEM_ID , MLD.UNIT

SELECT MLR.EXEC_RESULT_ID , MLR.EXEC_TASK_ID AS UNLOADING_ID , MLR.EXEC_TASK_DTL_ID AS UNLOADING_DETAIL_ID , MLR.STATE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MLR.COMPANY_CD, MLR.DIVISION_CD, 'WM0010', MLR.STATE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS STATE_NM , MLR.FROM_AREA_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_AREA_NAME(MLR.COMPANY_CD, MLR.DIVISION_CD, MLR.FROM_AREA_CD) FROM DUAL) AS FROM_AREA_NM , MLR.FROM_LOGISTICS_UNIT_CD , MLR.QTY AS UNLOADING_QTY , TO_CHAR(MLR.RESULT_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RESULT_DATE , TO_CHAR(MLR.CANCEL_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CANCEL_DATE , MLR.CANCEL_USER_NO , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MLR.COMPANY_CD, MLR.DIVISION_CD, MLR.CANCEL_USER_NO) FROM DUAL ) AS CANCEL_USER_NM , ROWIDTOCHAR(MLR.ROWID) , MLR.COMPANY_CD , MLR.DIVISION_CD FROM MOM_LOCATION_EXEC_RESULT MLR WHERE MLR.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MLR.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MLR.EXEC_TASK_ID = #{unloadingId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MLR.EXEC_TASK_ID = #{itemId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY MLR.EXEC_RESULT_ID
